body_html: Is tensorflow working correctly on the TX1, ie. able to run inference and get good results? When I installed tensorflow on a TK1 it ran just fine however the convolutional layers where producing bad results. I could train fully connected models on mnist just fine but when I tried to use conv layers it stopped converging. Is this problem persistent in the TX1 build?
body_text: Is tensorflow working correctly on the TX1, ie. able to run inference and get good results? body: Is tensorflow working correctly on the TX1, ie. able to run inference and get good results? When I installed tensorflow on a TK1 it ran just fine however the convolutional layers where producing bad results. I could train fully connected models on mnist just fine but when I tried to use conv layers it stopped converging. Is this problem persistent in the TX1 build?
